events.message: The customer reported an auto accident that occurred last night involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on the keywords found in the initial report.
An agent was assigned promptly to the case to ensure a smooth follow-up and customer assistance in the matter of the vehicle collision.
The insurance company sent an acknowledgement to the claimant confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining next steps.
Requested the claimant to submit the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and any medical bills related to the auto accident.
The claimant has submitted all requested documents including police report, vehicle photos, and medical receipts for the injury sustained.
The investigation team commenced review of the evidence and statements regarding the circumstances of the auto accident.
Investigation concluded that the claimant was not at fault, and damages to the vehicle were verified with submitted documentation.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover vehicle repairs and medical expenses arising from the auto accident.
The customer responded positively to the timely communication and fair settlement proposal regarding their car accident claim.
Final approval of the claim was issued after customer agreement on the settlement terms for the auto accident damages.
The agreed settlement amount was transferred to the claimant's account as compensation for accident-related expenses.
The claim file was officially closed following successful payment and resolution of the auto accident case.
All documents and correspondence related to the auto accident claim were archived in the companyâ€™s record system.
